help-one-title: Can I enroll VedusOne in the middle of the session ?
help-one-content: Yes, You can use join VedusOne anytime for your Learning process.
help-two-title: How can I deploy Learn Online ?
help-two-content: We have made the deployment process clean and simple. You can deploy the Template easily by following our documentation
help-three-title: How can I get the customer support?
help-three-content: After purchasing the product please open a ticket in the support forum and our support guys are always ready to help you at any kind of case. Follow this link: https://redqsupport.ticksy.com/
help-four-title: Will you regularly give updates of VedusOne Template?
help-four-content: Yes, We will update the VedusOne Template Regularly. We have a plan to give more exciting demos to our customers on a regular basis.
help-five-title: How can I get the refund?
help-five-content: The refund is available when we have shown the feature on our demo however it is not available on our template..
help-six-title: Template installation failed, how to run the template?
help-six-content: Please read the documentation carefully . We also have some online video tutorials regarding this issue . If the problem remains, Please Open a ticket in the support forum
